description: Turkish poet, playwright, and communist activist, considered the founder of modern Turkish poetry and one of the most important literary figures of the 20th century
philosophy: The most beautiful sea hasn't been crossed yet.
contributions: Letters from Prison to My Wife
quotes: The most beautiful thing on earth is the human being, that marvelous being who sings, laughs, struggles
To live like a tree single and free, and like a forest in brotherhood
